articles.title: American, Russians to blast off for ISS as war rages in Ukraine - Briefly
articles.description: A US astronaut and two Russian cosmonauts are set to blast off to the International Space Station Wednesday on a Russian-operated flight despite soaring tensions between Moscow and Washington over Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
NASA astronaut Frank Rubio (L), and Russian cosmonauts Sergey Prokopyev and Dmitri Petelin, are set to blast off to the International Space Station (ISS).

articles.title: Judge ties Babe Ruth with 60th home run, Yankees stun Pirates with epic comeback - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: The New York Yankees completed a stunning five-run, ninth-inning rally to beat the Pittsburgh Pirates 9-8 while Aaron Judge moved within one of Roger Maris' American League record.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Aaron Judge sent a sinker soaring into the left-field bleachers, another of his no-doubt drives, and circled the bases for the 60th time.
